titleStmt.title: Essayes with brief adviso's accomodated capacity of the ladyes and gentlemen, sometime students of the English academy lately erected at London : to whose use and perusall they are recommended in exchange of their English lectures of late published.
titleStmt.author: Sprigg, William, fl. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.S. for Robert Blagrave ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sprigg by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages tightly bound, with print show through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library
